title: LUCIEN WHITE SAPPHIRE LEVERBACK, GOLD
description:
SOLD AS A PAIR.
The Art Deco inspired Lucien drop earring is designed with a bright, white lab-grown sapphire. Set in silver and fastened to a delicate, 18k gold-coated sterling silver hook, she was designed to sit seamlessly alongside your own hoop and stud friends on the same ear.
details:
Metal: 18k Gold-coated sterling silver
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Closure: Leverback



Medium: 2.00 CTW DEW (1.00 carat per ear)Â 
Large: 3.00 CTW DEW (1.50 carat per ear)

Style Notes:
Model wears Large Lucien in the primary earring hole and Medium Lucien in the second earring hole.
What is Lab-Grown?
